CONTENT: クリスマスだからと劇的なことは起こらない
CONTENT_TRANSLATION_SPANISH: Que sea Navidad no garantiza que vaya a ocurrir nada dramático.
CONTENT_TRANSLATION_ENGLISH: Nothing dramatic is guaranteed to happen just because it's Christmas.

CONTENT: きっと 今日という日はいい思い出にならない
CONTENT_TRANSLATION_SPANISH: El de hoy no va a ser un gran recuerdo.
CONTENT_TRANSLATION_ENGLISH: Today's not going to be a great memory or anything.

CONTENT: クリスマスとは何か
CONTENT_TRANSLATION_SPANISH: ¿Qué es exactamente la Navidad?
CONTENT_TRANSLATION_ENGLISH: What exactly is Christmas?

CONTENT: クリスマスとはいかなるものか
CONTENT_TRANSLATION_SPANISH: ¿Cómo de grande es el fenómeno de la Navidad?
CONTENT_TRANSLATION_ENGLISH: Just how grand is this phenomenon known as Christmas?

CONTENT: クリスマスに 正解はあるのか
CONTENT_TRANSLATION_SPANISH: ¿Hay alguna manera correcta de celebrarla?
CONTENT_TRANSLATION_ENGLISH: Is there a right way to celebrate Christmas?

CONTENT: クリスマスに基づく幸運とはどんな形か
CONTENT_TRANSLATION_SPANISH: ¿Cuál es la suerte que supuestamente trae la Navidad?
CONTENT_TRANSLATION_ENGLISH: What is this luck that supposedly comes with Christmas?

CONTENT: クリスマスに生まれるものは輝きを持つのか
CONTENT_TRANSLATION_SPANISH: ¿Lo que nace en Navidad brilla más o qué?
CONTENT_TRANSLATION_ENGLISH: Does something that's born on Christmas shine bright?

CONTENT: クリスマスとは 一体　何をすればいいのだろうか
CONTENT_TRANSLATION_SPANISH: ¿Qué se supone que se debe hacer en Navidad?
CONTENT_TRANSLATION_ENGLISH: What exactly are you supposed to do on Christmas?

CONTENT: ほら!
CONTENT_TRANSLATION_SPANISH: ¡Oye!
CONTENT_TRANSLATION_ENGLISH: Hey, now!

CONTENT: ボッとすんな!　あ... すいません　あの 店長
CONTENT_TRANSLATION_SPANISH: Deja de distraerte. Lo siento. Oiga, jefe.
CONTENT_TRANSLATION_ENGLISH: Quit spacing out! Oh, sorry. U-Um, Manager?

CONTENT: 何だ?
CONTENT_TRANSLATION_SPANISH: ¿Qué pasa?
CONTENT_TRANSLATION_ENGLISH: What is it?

CONTENT: クリスマス... 25日は休ませてもらっていいですか?
CONTENT_TRANSLATION_SPANISH: En Navidad, ¿puedo...? ¿Puedo cogerme libre el día 25?
CONTENT_TRANSLATION_ENGLISH: May I take Christmas... May I take the 25th off?

CONTENT: デート?
CONTENT_TRANSLATION_SPANISH: ¿Tienes una cita?
CONTENT_TRANSLATION_ENGLISH: You got a date?

CONTENT: そ... そういう言い方じゃ ないですけど...
CONTENT_TRANSLATION_SPANISH: Yo no... lo llamaría así...
CONTENT_TRANSLATION_ENGLISH: I-I wouldn't exactly... ...call it that...

CONTENT: そもそもデートというのは
CONTENT_TRANSLATION_SPANISH: Para empezar, ¿en una cita
CONTENT_TRANSLATION_ENGLISH: First off, is a date where you do

CONTENT: 気になる相手と仲良くなるため楽しい時間を一緒に過ごすことなのかな?
CONTENT_TRANSLATION_SPANISH: vas a divertirte con alguien que te interesa para acercarte a ella?
CONTENT_TRANSLATION_ENGLISH: something fun with someone you're interested in to get closer to them?

CONTENT: だとするとデートというのもあながち間違いではないような気がする
CONTENT_TRANSLATION_SPANISH: En ese caso, podría decirse que es una cita.
CONTENT_TRANSLATION_ENGLISH: And in that case, I guess you could sort of call this a date.

CONTENT: しまむらとデート　クリスマスに 何をすれば...
CONTENT_TRANSLATION_SPANISH: Mi cita con Shimamura... ¿Qué vamos a hacer en Navidad?
CONTENT_TRANSLATION_ENGLISH: My date with Shimamura... What should we do on Christmas?

CONTENT: チキン ケーキ ツリー
CONTENT_TRANSLATION_SPANISH: Pollo, tarta, un árbol,
CONTENT_TRANSLATION_ENGLISH: Chicken, a cake, a tree,

CONTENT: プレゼント
CONTENT_TRANSLATION_SPANISH: un regalo...
CONTENT_TRANSLATION_ENGLISH: a present...

CONTENT: しまむらへのプレゼント
CONTENT_TRANSLATION_SPANISH: Tengo que regalarle algo.
CONTENT_TRANSLATION_ENGLISH: A present for Shimamura.

CONTENT: プレゼント プレゼント
CONTENT_TRANSLATION_SPANISH: Un regalo, un regalo...
CONTENT_TRANSLATION_ENGLISH: A present, a present...

CONTENT: しまむらに クリスマスの...
CONTENT_TRANSLATION_SPANISH: Un regalo de Navidad para Shimamura...
CONTENT_TRANSLATION_ENGLISH: A Christmas present for Shimamura-

CONTENT: おっす! あだちっち何ボーッとしてんの?　立ちくらみ?
CONTENT_TRANSLATION_SPANISH: ¡Hola, Adachicchi! ¿Qué haces en Babia? ¿Te encuentras mal?
CONTENT_TRANSLATION_ENGLISH: Heya, Adachicchi! What're you spaced out for? You feeling faint?

CONTENT: そういうのじゃないけど
CONTENT_TRANSLATION_SPANISH: No es eso.
CONTENT_TRANSLATION_ENGLISH: It's not that.

CONTENT: あー しまむら待ちか
CONTENT_TRANSLATION_SPANISH: Debes de estar esperando a Shimamura.
CONTENT_TRANSLATION_ENGLISH: Oh, you must be waiting for Shimamura.

CONTENT: いや 別に
CONTENT_TRANSLATION_SPANISH: En realidad no...
CONTENT_TRANSLATION_ENGLISH: No, not really...

CONTENT: そっちこそ1人なの珍しいね
CONTENT_TRANSLATION_SPANISH: Es muy raro verte sola.
CONTENT_TRANSLATION_ENGLISH: Hey, it's rare to see you alone.

CONTENT: ホントだ いない　あいつが 私を見失うなんて
CONTENT_TRANSLATION_SPANISH: Vaya, no está aquí. ¿Cómo me habrá perdido de vista?
CONTENT_TRANSLATION_ENGLISH: Oh, yeah. She's not here. How did she lose me?

CONTENT: 永藤 待たなくてよかったの?
CONTENT_TRANSLATION_SPANISH: ¿No vas a esperar a Nagafuji?
CONTENT_TRANSLATION_ENGLISH: Don't you need to wait for Nagafuji?

CONTENT: あだっちーをメーシーに誘うチャンスなんて　なかなか ないからさ
CONTENT_TRANSLATION_SPANISH: Rara vez puedo almorzar contigo a solas.
CONTENT_TRANSLATION_ENGLISH: I don't usually get the chance to ask you out to lunch.

CONTENT: いただきます
CONTENT_TRANSLATION_SPANISH: Que aproveche.
CONTENT_TRANSLATION_ENGLISH: Thanks for the grub!

CONTENT: いただきます
CONTENT_TRANSLATION_SPANISH: Que aproveche.
CONTENT_TRANSLATION_ENGLISH: Let's eat.

CONTENT: あのさ
CONTENT_TRANSLATION_SPANISH: Oye.
CONTENT_TRANSLATION_ENGLISH: Say.

CONTENT: しまむらって何が好きか知ってる?
CONTENT_TRANSLATION_SPANISH: ¿Por casualidad no sabrás qué le gusta a Shimamura?
CONTENT_TRANSLATION_ENGLISH: Do you know what Shimamura likes?

CONTENT: あいつの好きなもの...って あんの?
CONTENT_TRANSLATION_SPANISH: ¿Hay algo que le guste?
CONTENT_TRANSLATION_ENGLISH: Does she have anything she actually likes?

CONTENT: そういうの話す性格じゃないんだよね
CONTENT_TRANSLATION_SPANISH: No suele hablar de esas cosas.
CONTENT_TRANSLATION_ENGLISH: She's not the type of person that actually talks about stuff like that.

CONTENT: 知ってる しまむらと買い物とか行ったことない?
CONTENT_TRANSLATION_SPANISH: Ya... ¿Has ido alguna vez de compras con Shimamura?
CONTENT_TRANSLATION_ENGLISH: I know... Have you been shopping with Shimamura before?

CONTENT: 何回か行ったけど 本屋とか
CONTENT_TRANSLATION_SPANISH: Sí, pero solo hemos ido a la librería.
CONTENT_TRANSLATION_ENGLISH: I have, but it's usually like a bookstore.

CONTENT: あとは お茶屋をのぞいたことあったかな
CONTENT_TRANSLATION_SPANISH: Ah, también nos pasamos por una tienda de té.
CONTENT_TRANSLATION_ENGLISH: Oh, and we've peeked in a tea shop before.

CONTENT: お茶?
CONTENT_TRANSLATION_SPANISH: ¿De té?
CONTENT_TRANSLATION_ENGLISH: Tea shop?

CONTENT: まあ 私の関係でね　しまむらはついでに のぞいただけ
CONTENT_TRANSLATION_SPANISH: Fuimos por mí, pero Shimamura también echó un vistazo en la tienda.
CONTENT_TRANSLATION_ENGLISH: Well, we went because of me, but Shimamura did have a look, too.

CONTENT: あっ そのときにお茶の葉で いい香りって気に入っていたやつがあったかも
CONTENT_TRANSLATION_SPANISH: Ah, sí, creo que le atrajo el olor de uno de los tés,
CONTENT_TRANSLATION_ENGLISH: Oh, yeah. I think there was a certain tea that she said smelled good.

CONTENT: 紅茶だったか お茶だったか...
CONTENT_TRANSLATION_SPANISH: pero no recuerdo si era negro o verde.
CONTENT_TRANSLATION_ENGLISH: But I don't remember if it was black tea or green...

CONTENT: へえ お茶かあ
CONTENT_TRANSLATION_SPANISH: Ya veo. Té...
CONTENT_TRANSLATION_ENGLISH: I see. So tea...

CONTENT: そのお茶の名前とか思い出せる?
CONTENT_TRANSLATION_SPANISH: Por casualidad, ¿te acuerdas del nombre del té?
CONTENT_TRANSLATION_ENGLISH: You wouldn't happen to remember the name of that tea, would you?

CONTENT: えーっと ちょっと待ってよ
CONTENT_TRANSLATION_SPANISH: A ver... Un momento.
CONTENT_TRANSLATION_ENGLISH: Um... One sec.

CONTENT: あー 何だったかなあ　麦茶ではなかったし
CONTENT_TRANSLATION_SPANISH: ¿Cuál era? No era té de cebada...
CONTENT_TRANSLATION_ENGLISH: Man, what was it? It wasn't barley tea...

CONTENT: どっちの棚だったかなあ
CONTENT_TRANSLATION_SPANISH: ¿En qué estante estaba...?
CONTENT_TRANSLATION_ENGLISH: Which shelf was it on...?

CONTENT: ダメだ 忘れた
CONTENT_TRANSLATION_SPANISH: No, no me acuerdo.
CONTENT_TRANSLATION_ENGLISH: Nope, I don't remember.

CONTENT: 名前も出かかってるんだけどね
CONTENT_TRANSLATION_SPANISH: Pero tengo el nombre en la punta de la lengua.
CONTENT_TRANSLATION_ENGLISH: The name is on the tip of my tongue, though.

CONTENT: 見れば思い出せるかなあ 多分
CONTENT_TRANSLATION_SPANISH: Si lo viera otra vez, creo que lo recordaría.
CONTENT_TRANSLATION_ENGLISH: I think I can remember it if I see it again.

CONTENT: あっ 見れば!　あーっと 見に... 行ってくれる?
CONTENT_TRANSLATION_SPANISH: Si lo vieras... ¿Podrías ir a buscarlo conmigo?
CONTENT_TRANSLATION_ENGLISH: If you see it... Um... Will you look for it with me?

CONTENT: ふむ しまむら連れて行って聞けばいいんじゃねえの?
CONTENT_TRANSLATION_SPANISH: Bueno, también podrías ir con Shimamura y ya está.
CONTENT_TRANSLATION_ENGLISH: Hm. I mean, you could just take Shimamura with you.

CONTENT: なるほど そういうことなら　私が一緒に行って選んであげよう
CONTENT_TRANSLATION_SPANISH: Ya veo... En ese caso, iré contigo a elegirlo.
CONTENT_TRANSLATION_ENGLISH: Ah, I see. In that case, I'll go with you and choose.

CONTENT: ホントに!?
CONTENT_TRANSLATION_SPANISH: ¿En serio?
CONTENT_TRANSLATION_ENGLISH: Really?

CONTENT: 日野がいた!　おうおう 遅いよ　どこ迷子になってたんだい?　永藤ちゃんよお
CONTENT_TRANSLATION_SPANISH: ¡Ahí estás, Hino! Por fin llegas. ¿Dónde te habías metido, Nagafuji?
CONTENT_TRANSLATION_ENGLISH: There's Hino! There you are. Where'd you get lost at, Nagafuji?

CONTENT: あれー?さっきより小さくなってない?
CONTENT_TRANSLATION_SPANISH: ¿Eh? Oye... ¿Has encogido?
CONTENT_TRANSLATION_ENGLISH: Oh? H-Hey... Did you shrink?

CONTENT: いやあ 日野がいつもより小さいから見失ったのかと思って
CONTENT_TRANSLATION_SPANISH: Te perdí porque parecías más pequeña que de costumbre.
CONTENT_TRANSLATION_ENGLISH: It's just you seem smaller than usual, so I lost track of you.

CONTENT: あっ ラーメン食べていい?
CONTENT_TRANSLATION_SPANISH: ¿Te importa si como un poco?
CONTENT_TRANSLATION_ENGLISH: Do you mind if I have some ramen?

CONTENT: んじゃあ パンよこしな
CONTENT_TRANSLATION_SPANISH: Pues trae algo de pan.
CONTENT_TRANSLATION_ENGLISH: Hand over some bread, then.

CONTENT: 仲いいなあ
CONTENT_TRANSLATION_SPANISH: Son muy amigas.
CONTENT_TRANSLATION_ENGLISH: They're so close...

CONTENT: 私にはしまむらの頭なんてとても 叩けそうにない
CONTENT_TRANSLATION_SPANISH: No me veo capaz de pegar a Shimamura en la cabeza de esa forma.
CONTENT_TRANSLATION_ENGLISH: I don't think I'd ever... be able to smack Shimamura on the head like that.

CONTENT: ごめーん
CONTENT_TRANSLATION_SPANISH: Perdón.
CONTENT_TRANSLATION_ENGLISH: Sorry!

CONTENT: あだっつぃー 待ったー?
CONTENT_TRANSLATION_SPANISH: Adatty, ¿llevas mucho esperando?
CONTENT_TRANSLATION_ENGLISH: Adatty, have you been waiting long?

CONTENT: 永藤は いないの?
CONTENT_TRANSLATION_SPANISH: ¿Nagafuji no está contigo?
CONTENT_TRANSLATION_ENGLISH: Nagafuji's not with you?

CONTENT: あいつは用があるんだってさ
CONTENT_TRANSLATION_SPANISH: Al parecer, tenía cosas que hacer.
CONTENT_TRANSLATION_ENGLISH: She apparently had something to do.

CONTENT: まあ 一年に一度くらいそういう日もある　行こうぜうん
CONTENT_TRANSLATION_SPANISH: Una vez al año tiene un día así. De todas formas, vamos.
CONTENT_TRANSLATION_ENGLISH: She has a day like that like once a year. Anyway, let's go!

CONTENT: あっ 後ろ乗る?
CONTENT_TRANSLATION_SPANISH: ¿Quieres montarte en la parte de atrás?
CONTENT_TRANSLATION_ENGLISH: Oh... Do you want to get on the back?

CONTENT: 乗るけど 学校から ちょっと離れないと
CONTENT_TRANSLATION_SPANISH: Vale, pero primero tenemos que alejarnos del insti.
CONTENT_TRANSLATION_ENGLISH: I will, but we should get away from school first.

CONTENT: 先生に見られたらうるさいじゃん
CONTENT_TRANSLATION_SPANISH: Como nos vea algún profe nos caerá una buena.
CONTENT_TRANSLATION_ENGLISH: If a teacher sees us, we'll never hear the end of it.

CONTENT: 何?
CONTENT_TRANSLATION_SPANISH: ¿Qué?
CONTENT_TRANSLATION_ENGLISH: What?

CONTENT: 日野は 優等生だと思って
CONTENT_TRANSLATION_SPANISH: No te veía como una buena estudiante.
CONTENT_TRANSLATION_ENGLISH: I never thought of you as an honor student.

CONTENT: もっと 褒めてもいいのよ
CONTENT_TRANSLATION_SPANISH: Venga, halágame más.
CONTENT_TRANSLATION_ENGLISH: Praise me more.

CONTENT: 本当はおかしいんだろうなあ
CONTENT_TRANSLATION_SPANISH: Es muy extraño...
CONTENT_TRANSLATION_ENGLISH: I bet it is pretty weird...

CONTENT: 女同士でクリスマスに出歩くのを想像して
CONTENT_TRANSLATION_SPANISH: Es imaginarme pasando la Navidad con otra chica
CONTENT_TRANSLATION_ENGLISH: That I'm imagining walking around town on Christmas with another girl

CONTENT: 心が弾むなんて
CONTENT_TRANSLATION_SPANISH: y se me acelera el corazón.
CONTENT_TRANSLATION_ENGLISH: and my heart is about to burst.

CONTENT: しまむらは きっとこんなふうにはクリスマスを待ち望んではいない
CONTENT_TRANSLATION_SPANISH: Apuesto a que Shimamura no está tan nerviosa.
CONTENT_TRANSLATION_ENGLISH: I'm sure that Shimamura isn't this anxious about Christmas.

CONTENT: 私としまむらの間には大きな温度差があって
CONTENT_TRANSLATION_SPANISH: Hay una gran diferencia entre lo que sentimos las dos.
CONTENT_TRANSLATION_ENGLISH: There's definitely a difference in how I feel about Shimamura and vice versa.

CONTENT: 私は それを知ってほしいのか知られたくないのか
CONTENT_TRANSLATION_SPANISH: No estoy segura de si quiero que sepa lo mío.
CONTENT_TRANSLATION_ENGLISH: And I'm not sure if I want her to realize that... or not.

CONTENT: いつも ありがとうございます
CONTENT_TRANSLATION_SPANISH: Gracias por volver.
CONTENT_TRANSLATION_ENGLISH: Thank you for coming by again.

CONTENT: どうもー
CONTENT_TRANSLATION_SPANISH: Hola.
CONTENT_TRANSLATION_ENGLISH: Heya.

CONTENT: よく来るの?
CONTENT_TRANSLATION_SPANISH: Té de jengibre ¿Vienes mucho?
CONTENT_TRANSLATION_ENGLISH: Do you come here often?

CONTENT: うん まあ　家の人が飲んだり 飲まなかったり
CONTENT_TRANSLATION_SPANISH: Sí... Puede que alguien en mi familia beba mucho té...
CONTENT_TRANSLATION_ENGLISH: Yeah... I may or may not have someone in my family who drinks a lot of tea...

CONTENT: 生姜かあ 体あったまりそう
CONTENT_TRANSLATION_SPANISH: Jengibre... Seguro que te espabila.
CONTENT_TRANSLATION_ENGLISH: Ginger... That'd probably warm you right up.

CONTENT: 冷え症に効果的らしいよ
CONTENT_TRANSLATION_SPANISH: Es perfecto para quien se resfría fácilmente.
CONTENT_TRANSLATION_ENGLISH: Apparently, it works great for people who get cold easily...

CONTENT: 家の人に言わせると
CONTENT_TRANSLATION_SPANISH: O eso dicen en mi familia.
CONTENT_TRANSLATION_ENGLISH: According to my family member.

CONTENT: 日野は飲まないの?
CONTENT_TRANSLATION_SPANISH: ¿Tú no bebes?
CONTENT_TRANSLATION_ENGLISH: You don't drink it?

CONTENT: 別に冷え症じゃないからねえ　どこだったかな?
CONTENT_TRANSLATION_SPANISH: Yo no me resfrío así como así. A ver, ¿dónde estaba?
CONTENT_TRANSLATION_ENGLISH: Well, I don't exactly get cold easily. Let's see, where was it...?

CONTENT: えっと 確かこの棚だったような...
CONTENT_TRANSLATION_SPANISH: Estoy segura de que estaba en esta parte...
CONTENT_TRANSLATION_ENGLISH: I'm pretty sure it was on this shelf...

CONTENT: あだっつぃー君　1つ聞きたい
CONTENT_TRANSLATION_SPANISH: Oye, Adatty, ¿puedo preguntarte algo?
CONTENT_TRANSLATION_ENGLISH: Hey, Adatty. Can I ask you something?

CONTENT: もし 自信満々に「はい これ」と渡しておいて
CONTENT_TRANSLATION_SPANISH: ¿Eres de las que se enfadaría si te dijera
CONTENT_TRANSLATION_ENGLISH: Are you the type that would get mad if I confidently told you,

CONTENT: 間違っていたら怒っちゃう人ですか?
CONTENT_TRANSLATION_SPANISH: que es el correcto pero me equivocara?
CONTENT_TRANSLATION_ENGLISH: \"Yeah, this is the one!\" and was totally wrong?

CONTENT: そこまでひどい性格ではないと思うけど
CONTENT_TRANSLATION_SPANISH: Creo que no soy tan mala persona.
CONTENT_TRANSLATION_ENGLISH: I don't think my personality sucks that badly...

CONTENT: ならいいや 多分これ
CONTENT_TRANSLATION_SPANISH: Perfecto. Entonces, creo que era este.
CONTENT_TRANSLATION_ENGLISH: Oh, good. Then I think it's this one.

CONTENT: いやー 悪いね　おごってもらっちゃって　って 私がねだったんだけど
CONTENT_TRANSLATION_SPANISH: Gracias por invitarme, aunque la propuesta haya sido mía.
CONTENT_TRANSLATION_ENGLISH: Man... Thanks for treating me. Though I sorta talked you into it.

CONTENT: ここ ちょっと寒いねえ
CONTENT_TRANSLATION_SPANISH: Hace un poco de frío aquí.
CONTENT_TRANSLATION_ENGLISH: It's a bit chilly in here.

CONTENT: 足スースー
CONTENT_TRANSLATION_SPANISH: Tengo las piernas congeladas.
CONTENT_TRANSLATION_ENGLISH: My legs are freezing.

CONTENT: うん
CONTENT_TRANSLATION_SPANISH: Sí.
CONTENT_TRANSLATION_ENGLISH: Yeah.

CONTENT: 話すことないから困るって思ってるだろ?
CONTENT_TRANSLATION_SPANISH: Estás nerviosa porque no sabes qué decir, ¿verdad?
CONTENT_TRANSLATION_ENGLISH: You're totally anxious because you don't know what to say right now, huh?

CONTENT: うっ ま... まあ
CONTENT_TRANSLATION_SPANISH: Sí...
CONTENT_TRANSLATION_ENGLISH: Y-Yeah...

CONTENT: って 永藤と来ても似たようなものだけどね
CONTENT_TRANSLATION_SPANISH: Estoy segura de que sería igual si Nagafuji estuviera aquí.
CONTENT_TRANSLATION_ENGLISH: I'm sure it would've been the same with Nagafuji here, too.

CONTENT: あいつの場合 うん?
CONTENT_TRANSLATION_SPANISH: Aunque en su caso...
CONTENT_TRANSLATION_ENGLISH: Though, in her case... Huh?

CONTENT: 用事って へえー ほう...　聞いてた?
CONTENT_TRANSLATION_SPANISH: Así que eso era lo que tenía que hacer... ¿Tú lo sabías?
CONTENT_TRANSLATION_ENGLISH: So that's what she had to do... Did you know about this?

CONTENT: はあ やれやれ　困るなあ 君
CONTENT_TRANSLATION_SPANISH: Vaya tela. ¿Qué voy a hacer contigo?
CONTENT_TRANSLATION_ENGLISH: Good grief. What am I going to do with you?

CONTENT: えっ 何が?
CONTENT_TRANSLATION_SPANISH: ¿Eh? ¿Qué?
CONTENT_TRANSLATION_ENGLISH: Huh? What?

CONTENT: 後でも つけてみる?
CONTENT_TRANSLATION_SPANISH: ¿Quieres seguirlas?
CONTENT_TRANSLATION_ENGLISH: Wanna follow them?

CONTENT: やめとこう 用事があるみたいだし
CONTENT_TRANSLATION_SPANISH: Mejor que no. Parecía que estaban ocupadas.
CONTENT_TRANSLATION_ENGLISH: Let's not. They seem busy.

CONTENT: あだっつぃーはホント 優等生よのう
CONTENT_TRANSLATION_SPANISH: Adatty, eres toda una estudiante modelo.
CONTENT_TRANSLATION_ENGLISH: Ah, Adatty, always the honor student.

CONTENT: 自分だけだと思い上がっていた
CONTENT_TRANSLATION_SPANISH: Creía que yo era la única
CONTENT_TRANSLATION_ENGLISH: I thought I was the only one...

CONTENT: しまむらと2人で出かけるその隣にいるのは自分だけなんだって
CONTENT_TRANSLATION_SPANISH: que salía sola con Shimamura.
CONTENT_TRANSLATION_ENGLISH: ...that got to hang out with Shimamura alone.

CONTENT: それが大きな思い違いだったことに　痛みを覚えることこそ間違っている
CONTENT_TRANSLATION_SPANISH: El hecho de que estuviera equivocada no debería doler tanto.
CONTENT_TRANSLATION_ENGLISH: And the fact that I was totally wrong about that shouldn't hurt this much.

CONTENT: 反省
CONTENT_TRANSLATION_SPANISH: Soy una estúpida.
CONTENT_TRANSLATION_ENGLISH: I'm so dumb.

CONTENT: しまむら
CONTENT_TRANSLATION_SPANISH: Shimamura...
CONTENT_TRANSLATION_ENGLISH: Shimamura...

CONTENT: その名前を呼ぶだけで
CONTENT_TRANSLATION_SPANISH: Con solo decir su nombre...
CONTENT_TRANSLATION_ENGLISH: Just saying her name...

CONTENT: しまむらという言葉の響きだけで　今年の冬は乗り切れそうだった
CONTENT_TRANSLATION_SPANISH: Solo el sonido de su nombre era suficiente para soportar este invierno.
CONTENT_TRANSLATION_ENGLISH: Just the sound of her name was enough to get me through this winter.

CONTENT: ねえねえねえ!
CONTENT_TRANSLATION_SPANISH: Oye, oye, oye.
CONTENT_TRANSLATION_ENGLISH: Hey, hey, hey.

CONTENT: ヤチーって ホントに宇宙人?
CONTENT_TRANSLATION_SPANISH: Yachi, ¿de verdad eres un alien?
CONTENT_TRANSLATION_ENGLISH: Are you really an alien, Yachi?

CONTENT: チッチッチッ
CONTENT_TRANSLATION_ENGLISH: Tsk, tsk, tsk.

CONTENT: ホントも何もウソついたことありません
CONTENT_TRANSLATION_SPANISH: Por supuesto que sí, yo nunca miento.
CONTENT_TRANSLATION_ENGLISH: But of course. I have never told a lie.

CONTENT: 証拠見せて 宇宙人の証拠!
CONTENT_TRANSLATION_SPANISH: Entonces demuéstramelo.
CONTENT_TRANSLATION_ENGLISH: Then show me proof! Proof that you're an alien.

CONTENT: チッチッチッ 見せるのは協定違反なので できません
CONTENT_TRANSLATION_SPANISH: Si te lo demostrara, estaría violando mi contrato.
CONTENT_TRANSLATION_ENGLISH: Tsk, tsk, tsk. I would be violating my agreement if I showed you, so I cannot.

CONTENT: 宇宙も色々厳しい... おやっ?
CONTENT_TRANSLATION_SPANISH: Las reglas del universo son estrictas.
CONTENT_TRANSLATION_ENGLISH: The rules of the universe can be rather strict. Oh?

CONTENT: しまむらしょうさんそれは何ですか?
CONTENT_TRANSLATION_SPANISH: Pequeña Shimamura, ¿eso qué es?
CONTENT_TRANSLATION_ENGLISH: What is that, Little Shimamura?

CONTENT: 過激な音ですな
CONTENT_TRANSLATION_SPANISH: Vaya, qué sonido tan dramático...
CONTENT_TRANSLATION_ENGLISH: My, my, my, what a dramatic sound...

CONTENT: 過激なのは ヤチーだけだよ
CONTENT_TRANSLATION_SPANISH: Tú sí que eres dramática.
CONTENT_TRANSLATION_ENGLISH: You're the one that's dramatic, Yachi.

CONTENT: もう少し優しい感じに息を吐いて
CONTENT_TRANSLATION_SPANISH: Tienes que soplar con más suavidad.
CONTENT_TRANSLATION_ENGLISH: Just breathe into it more gently...

CONTENT: あっ そろそろ特売の時間なので 行かねば
CONTENT_TRANSLATION_SPANISH: Ya casi es la hora. Debo irme.
CONTENT_TRANSLATION_ENGLISH: Ah, it's almost discount time, so I must go.

CONTENT: 宇宙語?
CONTENT_TRANSLATION_SPANISH: ¿Será cosas de aliens?
CONTENT_TRANSLATION_ENGLISH: Alienspeak?

CONTENT: 私としまむらは普通の友達だ
CONTENT_TRANSLATION_SPANISH: Shimamura y yo solo somos amigas.
CONTENT_TRANSLATION_ENGLISH: Shimamura and I are just normal friends.

CONTENT: 少なくともしまむらにとっては
CONTENT_TRANSLATION_SPANISH: O así es como ella nos ve.
CONTENT_TRANSLATION_ENGLISH: At least, that's how Shimamura sees us.

CONTENT: その上で しまむらとの距離を一歩ずつでも詰めていきたい　だけど距離が近くなるというのは　伝わるものも大きくなるということで
CONTENT_TRANSLATION_SPANISH: Aun así, quiero irme acercando a ella poco a poco. Pero cuanto más me acerco más cosas sé.
CONTENT_TRANSLATION_ENGLISH: Even then, I still want to get closer to Shimamura one step at a time. \"Where do you want to meet?\" \"Does 1 PM at the usual mall work?\" \"Roger\" \"I'm looking forward to tomorrow.\" But the closer you get, the more things get across.

CONTENT: 私は しまむらにクリスマスという お題目を得て
CONTENT_TRANSLATION_SPANISH: Aunque no dejo de mencionar lo de la Navidad con ella...
CONTENT_TRANSLATION_ENGLISH: I keep mentioning Christmas with Shimamura, but...

CONTENT: 愛? いやいやいや
CONTENT_TRANSLATION_SPANISH: ¿Será amor? No...
CONTENT_TRANSLATION_ENGLISH: Is it love? No, no, no...

CONTENT: 恋? いやいや いやいやいや!
CONTENT_TRANSLATION_SPANISH: ¿Romance? No...
CONTENT_TRANSLATION_ENGLISH: Romance? No, no, no...

CONTENT: 好き?
CONTENT_TRANSLATION_SPANISH: ¿Me gusta?
CONTENT_TRANSLATION_ENGLISH: Like...?

CONTENT: とにかく あたたかいものだ
CONTENT_TRANSLATION_SPANISH: Lo que sea es algo cálido.
CONTENT_TRANSLATION_ENGLISH: Whatever it is, it's warm and fuzzy.

CONTENT: 私の胸に流れるあたたかい液体だ
CONTENT_TRANSLATION_SPANISH: Es un líquido cálido que recorre mi pecho.
CONTENT_TRANSLATION_ENGLISH: It's a warm liquid that flows through my chest.

CONTENT: えっ?
CONTENT_TRANSLATION_ENGLISH: Huh?

CONTENT: どういう 「おー」?
CONTENT_TRANSLATION_SPANISH: ¿A qué viene ese palabro?
CONTENT_TRANSLATION_ENGLISH: What's this \"Cool\" supposed to mean?

CONTENT: えいえいおー? おーっと?
CONTENT_TRANSLATION_SPANISH: ¿Se refiere a \"qué guay\" o quiere que me tranquilice?
CONTENT_TRANSLATION_ENGLISH: Like, \"Coolio\"? Maybe she meant, \"Chill out\"?

CONTENT: ふーん そーおー?
CONTENT_TRANSLATION_SPANISH: ¿O será algo del frío?
CONTENT_TRANSLATION_ENGLISH: Or, \"Cool beans\"?

CONTENT: 私はしまむらの声が聞きたい
CONTENT_TRANSLATION_SPANISH: Quiero oír su voz.
CONTENT_TRANSLATION_ENGLISH: I want to hear Shimamura's voice...

CONTENT: もっと知りたいから
CONTENT_TRANSLATION_SPANISH: Quiero conocerla mejor.
CONTENT_TRANSLATION_ENGLISH: I want to know more about her.

CONTENT: 明日 たくさん聞けるから
CONTENT_TRANSLATION_SPANISH: Quiero preguntarle un montón de cosas mañana.
CONTENT_TRANSLATION_ENGLISH: And I'll be able to hear and ask her lots tomorrow.

CONTENT: 待った?
CONTENT_TRANSLATION_SPANISH: ¿Llevas mucho esperando?
CONTENT_TRANSLATION_ENGLISH: Were you waiting long?

CONTENT: 今 来たとこ
CONTENT_TRANSLATION_SPANISH: Acabo de llegar.
CONTENT_TRANSLATION_ENGLISH: I just got here.

CONTENT: ウソつけー
CONTENT_TRANSLATION_SPANISH: Mentira.
CONTENT_TRANSLATION_ENGLISH: You liar.

CONTENT: 5分前から遠くで見てたぞ座ってる安達のこと
CONTENT_TRANSLATION_SPANISH: Llevo observándote desde allí desde hace cinco minutos.
CONTENT_TRANSLATION_ENGLISH: I've been watching you sitting here for the last five minutes from afar.

CONTENT: いや 冗談だったんだけど　とにかくごめん 待たせたううん
CONTENT_TRANSLATION_SPANISH: Era broma. De todas formas, siento haber tardado.
CONTENT_TRANSLATION_ENGLISH: Er, I was just joking. Anyway, sorry for making you wait.

CONTENT: で 安達 一目見たときから気になっていたことがあるんだけど
CONTENT_TRANSLATION_SPANISH: Desde que te he visto, me he estado preguntando...
CONTENT_TRANSLATION_ENGLISH: So, I've been wondering ever since I saw you today...

CONTENT: えっ 何?
CONTENT_TRANSLATION_SPANISH: ¿Eh? ¿Qué?
CONTENT_TRANSLATION_ENGLISH: Huh? What?

CONTENT: 何で コートの下バイト先のチャイナドレスなの?
CONTENT_TRANSLATION_SPANISH: ¿Por qué llevas el vestido chino del curro debajo del abrigo?
CONTENT_TRANSLATION_ENGLISH: Why are you wearing your Chinese dress from work under your coat?

CONTENT: ああ まあやっぱり気になるよね
CONTENT_TRANSLATION_SPANISH: Sí, no te culpo por pensar en eso.
CONTENT_TRANSLATION_ENGLISH: Oh, uh... Yeah, I guess I can't blame you for wondering.

CONTENT: というか 変なお店の客引きと思われないかなあ
CONTENT_TRANSLATION_SPANISH: La verdad, ¿no crees que los demás van a pensar algo raro?
CONTENT_TRANSLATION_ENGLISH: Actually, won't people think you're trying to lure them into a sketchy shop?

CONTENT: 私だって おかしいと思う
CONTENT_TRANSLATION_SPANISH: Sí, hasta yo me lo digo.
CONTENT_TRANSLATION_ENGLISH: Look, even I know this is weird.

CONTENT: でも しまむらがかわいいって褒めてくれたから
CONTENT_TRANSLATION_SPANISH: Pero dijo que me quedaba bien, así que...
CONTENT_TRANSLATION_ENGLISH: But... She said I looked cute in it, so...

CONTENT: あっ 私はいいと思うよかわいいじゃん　美人は得だよねー よく似合ってるもの
CONTENT_TRANSLATION_SPANISH: Bueno, por mí no pasa nada. Estás muy guapa. Lo de ser guapa tiene que ser una pasada porque te puedes poner ese traje.
CONTENT_TRANSLATION_ENGLISH: Oh, I think it's fine. You look super cute. It must be nice being so pretty. You can actually pull that outfit off.

CONTENT: し... しまむらの方がかわいいし
CONTENT_TRANSLATION_SPANISH: Tú eres más guapa...
CONTENT_TRANSLATION_ENGLISH: B-But you're even cuter Shimamura...

CONTENT: ハハハ 嫌みはやめなさい
CONTENT_TRANSLATION_SPANISH: Ahórrate el sarcasmo.
CONTENT_TRANSLATION_ENGLISH: You can skip the sarcasm.

CONTENT: 今日は 2人でクリスマス
CONTENT_TRANSLATION_SPANISH: Las dos solas en Navidad...
CONTENT_TRANSLATION_ENGLISH: Christmas all alone with Shimamura...

CONTENT: しまむらは友達づきあいだから　仕方なく来てくれただけかもしれないけど
CONTENT_TRANSLATION_SPANISH: Aunque probablemente ha venido porque se siente obligada como amiga.
CONTENT_TRANSLATION_ENGLISH: Though Shimamura's probably only here because she felt obligated as a friend.

CONTENT: ダメだ 気を抜くと悪い方ばかりに考えが落ちこんでしま...
CONTENT_TRANSLATION_SPANISH: Tengo que parar. Cuando bajo la guardia me pongo en lo peor y me deprimo.
CONTENT_TRANSLATION_ENGLISH: I need to stop. Whenever I let my guard down, my thoughts just go down a dark path and I'll get depressed...

CONTENT: ご... ごめんなさい
CONTENT_TRANSLATION_SPANISH: Lo siento.
CONTENT_TRANSLATION_ENGLISH: S-Sorry.

CONTENT: うん 本当にごめんなさい
CONTENT_TRANSLATION_SPANISH: No, de verdad. Lo siento.
CONTENT_TRANSLATION_ENGLISH: No, really. I'm sorry.

CONTENT: はあ... あー そのひったくりみたいに手を取るのはやめようね
CONTENT_TRANSLATION_SPANISH: Oye... No me cojas de la mano como si fueras una carterista.
CONTENT_TRANSLATION_ENGLISH: So, hey. Don't suddenly grab my hand like a purse-snatcher.

CONTENT: ごめん
CONTENT_TRANSLATION_SPANISH: Perdona.
CONTENT_TRANSLATION_ENGLISH: Sorry.

CONTENT: 手 つなぐの?
CONTENT_TRANSLATION_SPANISH: ¿Nos cogemos de la mano?
CONTENT_TRANSLATION_ENGLISH: Did you want to hold hands?

CONTENT: できれば
CONTENT_TRANSLATION_SPANISH: Si es posible...
CONTENT_TRANSLATION_ENGLISH: If we could.

CONTENT: 前にもこんなやりとり しなかったかな?
CONTENT_TRANSLATION_SPANISH: ¿No lo hemos hecho ya antes?
CONTENT_TRANSLATION_ENGLISH: Didn't we do this all before?

CONTENT: したかも
CONTENT_TRANSLATION_SPANISH: Puede ser.
CONTENT_TRANSLATION_ENGLISH: Possibly.

CONTENT: 次回からはつないでいい?とか ちゃんと聞くように
CONTENT_TRANSLATION_SPANISH: La próxima vez, pregunta si está bien.
CONTENT_TRANSLATION_ENGLISH: Next time, make sure you just ask if it's okay.

CONTENT: 何? その反応　どうやって発音したの?
CONTENT_TRANSLATION_SPANISH: ¿Qué respuesta es esa? ¿Cómo se pronuncia?
CONTENT_TRANSLATION_ENGLISH: What kind of response is that? How did you even pronounce that?

CONTENT: エビに ちょっと似てたかも
CONTENT_TRANSLATION_SPANISH: Parecías una gamba.
CONTENT_TRANSLATION_ENGLISH: You might've sounded like a shrimp just now.

CONTENT: 今のは気にしないで　あの 分かった 次からは 聞く
CONTENT_TRANSLATION_SPANISH: Olvídalo. Esto... Vale. Te preguntaré la próxima vez.
CONTENT_TRANSLATION_ENGLISH: Just ignore that. Um... I got it, though. I'll ask next time.

CONTENT: そうして はい
CONTENT_TRANSLATION_SPANISH: Bien. Venga.
CONTENT_TRANSLATION_ENGLISH: Good. Come on.

CONTENT: そんなに慌てなくても
CONTENT_TRANSLATION_SPANISH: No tengas tanto miedo.
CONTENT_TRANSLATION_ENGLISH: You don't need to panic so much.

CONTENT: 他の誰も 私の手を取ろうとしないんだからさ
CONTENT_TRANSLATION_SPANISH: Nadie me va a robar la mano.
CONTENT_TRANSLATION_ENGLISH: No one else is going to steal my hand from you.

CONTENT: でもしまむらの横を歩く人は私だけじゃないから
CONTENT_TRANSLATION_SPANISH: Pero yo no soy la única con la que vas a solas...
CONTENT_TRANSLATION_ENGLISH: But I'm not the only one that gets to walk next to you...

CONTENT: ここで 遊ぼうと思います
CONTENT_TRANSLATION_SPANISH: Podemos jugar aquí.
CONTENT_TRANSLATION_ENGLISH: I was thinking we could play here.

CONTENT: へえー ゲームセンターかあ
CONTENT_TRANSLATION_SPANISH: ¿En unas recreativas?
CONTENT_TRANSLATION_ENGLISH: Huh... An arcade.

CONTENT: あっ 卓球台がある
CONTENT_TRANSLATION_SPANISH: Mira, una mesa de ping-pong.
CONTENT_TRANSLATION_ENGLISH: Oh, hey. A ping-pong table.

CONTENT: うん　でも 今日は...
CONTENT_TRANSLATION_SPANISH: Sí, pero estaba pensando...
CONTENT_TRANSLATION_ENGLISH: Yeah, but I was thinking...

CONTENT: これ エアホッケー どうかな?
CONTENT_TRANSLATION_SPANISH: Podríamos jugar al hockey aéreo, ¿qué opinas?
CONTENT_TRANSLATION_ENGLISH: We could play... this. Air hockey. What do you think?

CONTENT: いいね やろうか
CONTENT_TRANSLATION_SPANISH: Claro, ¿por qué no?
CONTENT_TRANSLATION_ENGLISH: Sure, why not?

CONTENT: うん
CONTENT_TRANSLATION_SPANISH: Vale.
CONTENT_TRANSLATION_ENGLISH: Okay.

CONTENT: エアホッケーは卓球に通じるものがある
CONTENT_TRANSLATION_SPANISH: El hockey aéreo es algo parecido al ping-pong.
CONTENT_TRANSLATION_ENGLISH: Air hockey is sort of similar to ping-pong in some ways.

CONTENT: 私達のお戯れといえばこれだった
CONTENT_TRANSLATION_SPANISH: Era nuestro pasatiempo.
CONTENT_TRANSLATION_ENGLISH: This was our pastime. You can go first, Adachi.

CONTENT: 体育館の2階で出会った私としまむら　どんな形でも出会ってしまえばそこに至る流れ　運命がある
CONTENT_TRANSLATION_SPANISH: Shimamura y yo nos conocimos en el segundo piso del gimnasio. No importa cómo fue, pero cuando nos conocimos hubo un camino y un destino que nos llevaron hasta ahí.
CONTENT_TRANSLATION_ENGLISH: Shimamura and I met on the second floor of the gym. No matter how it happened, once we've met, there was a path that led us there as well as fate.

CONTENT: どんな出会い方にも壮大な過去が用意されているのだ
CONTENT_TRANSLATION_SPANISH: Da igual cómo sea el encuentro, siempre hay un pasado que lo acompaña.
CONTENT_TRANSLATION_ENGLISH: No matter the encounter, there's always a grand past that goes along with it.

CONTENT: 200 500 何百億という全体の行動の積み重ねがあった上でしか
CONTENT_TRANSLATION_SPANISH: Doscientas o 500 mil millones de acciones hechas por todo el mundo
CONTENT_TRANSLATION_ENGLISH: Two hundred, 500, billions of actions done by everyone and everything

CONTENT: 人と 人は出会うことができない
CONTENT_TRANSLATION_SPANISH: son necesarias para conocerse.
CONTENT_TRANSLATION_ENGLISH: piled up together in order for two people to meet.

CONTENT: 何という道のりだったのだろう　1つでも違うものを選べば　私は しまむらに出会えなかったのだから
CONTENT_TRANSLATION_SPANISH: ¿Cómo será el camino que nos ha traído hasta aquí? Solo una decisión diferente habría supuesto que no nos conociéramos.
CONTENT_TRANSLATION_ENGLISH: I wonder what kind of paths led us to meet. Even one different decision would've meant that I wouldn't have met Shimamura.

CONTENT: その事実だけで 私は
CONTENT_TRANSLATION_SPANISH: Y eso...
CONTENT_TRANSLATION_ENGLISH: And that fact alone...

CONTENT: 今までの自分をどこまでも好きになれそうだった
CONTENT_TRANSLATION_SPANISH: me hizo querer mucho a mi yo del pasado.
CONTENT_TRANSLATION_ENGLISH: Made me endlessly like my past self.

CONTENT: あ... 安達　案外 うまいね
CONTENT_TRANSLATION_SPANISH: Eres muy buena en esto.
CONTENT_TRANSLATION_ENGLISH: Y-You're pretty good at this, Adachi...

CONTENT: ど... どうだ!
CONTENT_TRANSLATION_SPANISH: ¿Qué tal?
CONTENT_TRANSLATION_ENGLISH: H-How you like them apples?

CONTENT: 安達 超強いじゃん
CONTENT_TRANSLATION_SPANISH: Eres muy buena.
CONTENT_TRANSLATION_ENGLISH: Jeez, Adachi. You're super good.

CONTENT: 初心者いじめとはなかなか やるなあ
CONTENT_TRANSLATION_SPANISH: No me esperaba que fueras a por los novatos.
CONTENT_TRANSLATION_ENGLISH: I never expected you to be the type to pick on noobs.

CONTENT: そういうのじゃないから
CONTENT_TRANSLATION_SPANISH: No es eso.
CONTENT_TRANSLATION_ENGLISH: It's not like that.

CONTENT: 卓球も 安達が勝ち越していたよね
CONTENT_TRANSLATION_SPANISH: Creo que también tienes más victorias al ping-pong.
CONTENT_TRANSLATION_ENGLISH: I think you also had more wins in ping-pong, too.

CONTENT: そうだった?
CONTENT_TRANSLATION_SPANISH: ¿Ah, sí?
CONTENT_TRANSLATION_ENGLISH: Did I?

CONTENT: いや　やっぱり 私だったかなー
CONTENT_TRANSLATION_SPANISH: O tal vea sea yo.
CONTENT_TRANSLATION_ENGLISH: Wait, maybe it's me.

CONTENT: こっちが覚えていないからって改ざんするのは ずるい
CONTENT_TRANSLATION_SPANISH: No es justo inventarte cosas solo porque no te acuerdes.
CONTENT_TRANSLATION_ENGLISH: It's not fair to make stuff up just because I don't remember.

CONTENT: もう遠い... というほど昔には感じないんだよね
CONTENT_TRANSLATION_SPANISH: Pero no parece que haya pasado tanto tiempo.
CONTENT_TRANSLATION_ENGLISH: But it doesn't seem that long ago somehow.

CONTENT: 2年生になって 春が来て日差しが強くなったら
CONTENT_TRANSLATION_SPANISH: Cuando llegue la primavera, el sol y estemos en segundo,
CONTENT_TRANSLATION_ENGLISH: When spring comes and we become second-years and the sun is out more again,

CONTENT: また 体育館に行くのかなあ?
CONTENT_TRANSLATION_SPANISH: ¿volveremos a ir al gimnasio?
CONTENT_TRANSLATION_ENGLISH: I wonder if we're gonna go to the gym again.

CONTENT: 授業を受けて 放課後 ここに来て　ピンポンすればいいんじゃないかな
CONTENT_TRANSLATION_SPANISH: Podemos ir a clase, venir aquí después y jugar al ping-pong.
CONTENT_TRANSLATION_ENGLISH: I think we can just go to class, come here after school, and play ping-pong.

CONTENT: 100点　安達もすっかり優等生になったね
CONTENT_TRANSLATION_SPANISH: Sería perfecto. Ahora sí que eres toda una estudiante modelo.
CONTENT_TRANSLATION_ENGLISH: A perfect score. You're a total honor student now, Adachi.

CONTENT: でも 2年生かあ　クラスも替わるよねえ
CONTENT_TRANSLATION_SPANISH: Pero en segundo seguramente caeremos en clases distintas.
CONTENT_TRANSLATION_ENGLISH: But man, we're gonna be second-years... We'll probably be in different classes.

CONTENT: しまむら これ
CONTENT_TRANSLATION_SPANISH: Toma, Shimamura.
CONTENT_TRANSLATION_ENGLISH: Shimamura... here.

CONTENT: クリスマスプレゼントの... つもり
CONTENT_TRANSLATION_SPANISH: Te he comprado un regalo de Navidad.
CONTENT_TRANSLATION_ENGLISH: I bought you a Christmas gift... or something...

CONTENT: いや 何か嬉しいじゃないの　開けていい?
CONTENT_TRANSLATION_SPANISH: ¿Eh? Qué sorpresa. ¿Puedo abrirlo?
CONTENT_TRANSLATION_ENGLISH: Wow... Well, this was a nice surprise. Can I open it?

CONTENT: うん
CONTENT_TRANSLATION_SPANISH: Sí.
CONTENT_TRANSLATION_ENGLISH: Yeah.

CONTENT: あっ 香りのいいやつ　これ 飲んでみたかったんだ
CONTENT_TRANSLATION_SPANISH: Vaya, es el que olía bien. Tenía ganas de probarlo.
CONTENT_TRANSLATION_ENGLISH: Oh, hey. This is the nice smelling one. I wanted to try it out.

CONTENT: 嬉しいー
CONTENT_TRANSLATION_SPANISH: ¡Qué guay!
CONTENT_TRANSLATION_ENGLISH: This is great!

CONTENT: でも 何で私の好みを知ってるの?
CONTENT_TRANSLATION_SPANISH: Pero ¿cómo sabías que lo quería?
CONTENT_TRANSLATION_ENGLISH: But how did you know I liked this?

CONTENT: あっ...偶然?
CONTENT_TRANSLATION_SPANISH: ¿Por casualidad?
CONTENT_TRANSLATION_ENGLISH: Just a coincidence?

CONTENT: ではない
CONTENT_TRANSLATION_SPANISH: No...
CONTENT_TRANSLATION_ENGLISH: No...

CONTENT: うーん　あっ 日野から聞いたのか
CONTENT_TRANSLATION_SPANISH: Seguro que se lo has preguntado a Hino.
CONTENT_TRANSLATION_ENGLISH: Hm... Oh, you must've asked Hino.

CONTENT: う... うん
CONTENT_TRANSLATION_SPANISH: Sí.
CONTENT_TRANSLATION_ENGLISH: Y-Yeah.

CONTENT: 気を使わせちゃったねえ 安達　ありがとう
CONTENT_TRANSLATION_SPANISH: No tenías por qué, pero gracias.
CONTENT_TRANSLATION_ENGLISH: You really didn't have to, Adachi. But thank you.

CONTENT: 同じこと考えてるとは思わなかったなあ
CONTENT_TRANSLATION_SPANISH: Nunca pensé que pensaríamos lo mismo.
CONTENT_TRANSLATION_ENGLISH: I never thought you'd be thinking the same thing.

CONTENT: いい子の安達ちゃんにはお姉ちゃんからプレゼントをあげよう
CONTENT_TRANSLATION_SPANISH: Como has sido buena, tu hermana también te ha comprado un regalo.
CONTENT_TRANSLATION_ENGLISH: Since you're such a good little girl, Adachi, Big Sis got you a present, too.

CONTENT: 何 それ?
CONTENT_TRANSLATION_SPANISH: ¿Qué es eso?
CONTENT_TRANSLATION_ENGLISH: What is that?

CONTENT: ブーメラン　あっ こっちはゴーグル
CONTENT_TRANSLATION_SPANISH: Un bumerán... y unas gafas.
CONTENT_TRANSLATION_ENGLISH: A boomerang... Oh, and some goggles.

CONTENT: 遊ぶときに つけるの?
CONTENT_TRANSLATION_SPANISH: ¿Me las pongo cuando lo lance?
CONTENT_TRANSLATION_ENGLISH: Am I supposed to wear it when I throw this thing?

CONTENT: うん　買う前に投げて試したから
CONTENT_TRANSLATION_SPANISH: Sí. Lo he probado varias veces antes de comprarlo.
CONTENT_TRANSLATION_ENGLISH: Yeah. Oh, I threw it a few times before buying it.

CONTENT: 楽しかったよ 結構
CONTENT_TRANSLATION_SPANISH: Es más divertido de lo que crees.
CONTENT_TRANSLATION_ENGLISH: It's way more fun than you'd expect.

CONTENT: こういうの選ぶセンスないから　永藤と相談して選んでみたんだけど
CONTENT_TRANSLATION_SPANISH: Como soy muy mala para decidirme, le pedí ayuda a Nagafuji.
CONTENT_TRANSLATION_ENGLISH: I suck at choosing stuff like this, so I asked Nagafuji to help me pick.

CONTENT: 《ブーメランとか欲しいかも》
CONTENT_TRANSLATION_SPANISH: A lo mejor quiere un bumerán.
CONTENT_TRANSLATION_ENGLISH: Maybe she'd want a boomerang.

CONTENT: 《子供は喜ぶと思う楽しいよ これ》
CONTENT_TRANSLATION_SPANISH: Creo que a los niños les encanta porque es superdivertido.
CONTENT_TRANSLATION_ENGLISH: I think kids would love them. They're super fun.

CONTENT: 《冬場に投げると折れやすいけど》
CONTENT_TRANSLATION_SPANISH: Aunque en invierno se rompen cuando los lanzas.
CONTENT_TRANSLATION_ENGLISH: Though they tend to snap when you throw them around in winter.

CONTENT: あっ 永藤には妹へのプレゼントって名目だけどね
CONTENT_TRANSLATION_SPANISH: Solo le dije que estaba eligiendo un regalo para mi hermana.
CONTENT_TRANSLATION_ENGLISH: Oh, I just told Nagafuji I was getting a present for my little sister.

CONTENT: 永藤...　そうかそういうことだったんだ
CONTENT_TRANSLATION_SPANISH: Nagafuji... Ahora entiendo por qué estaba con ella...
CONTENT_TRANSLATION_ENGLISH: Nagafuji... I see. So that's why she was with her...

CONTENT: 安達?
CONTENT_TRANSLATION_SPANISH: ¿Adachi?
CONTENT_TRANSLATION_ENGLISH: Adachi?

CONTENT: ありがとう これ大事にするから
CONTENT_TRANSLATION_SPANISH: Gracias, voy a cuidarlo muy bien.
CONTENT_TRANSLATION_ENGLISH: Thanks... I'll take really good care of this.

CONTENT: 正直ブーメランは歓迎していない　けれど しまむらがくれた　という事実だけがプレゼントだ
CONTENT_TRANSLATION_SPANISH: El bumerán es lo de menos, pero... el hecho de dármelo es el mejor regalo que podía pedir.
CONTENT_TRANSLATION_ENGLISH: Honestly, I didn't care about the boomerang, but... The fact that Shimamura gave this to me... was the best gift I could ask for.

CONTENT: そう ブーメランを後ろに倒して構えるの
CONTENT_TRANSLATION_SPANISH: Sí. Pones el bumerán detrás de ti
CONTENT_TRANSLATION_ENGLISH: So, yeah. You hold the boomerang behind you,

CONTENT: で 縦に切るように 前へ投げる
CONTENT_TRANSLATION_SPANISH: y lo lanzas como si fueras a cortar algo verticalmente.
CONTENT_TRANSLATION_ENGLISH: and then throw it in front of you like you're going to chop something vertically.

CONTENT: そうそう あっ上に向けて投げないようにね
CONTENT_TRANSLATION_SPANISH: Sí, así. Por cierto, no lo tires hacia arriba.
CONTENT_TRANSLATION_ENGLISH: Yeah, like that. Make sure you don't throw it up, though.

CONTENT: 最初はこんなものかな
CONTENT_TRANSLATION_SPANISH: Bueno, es tu primera vez.
CONTENT_TRANSLATION_ENGLISH: Well, it's your first try.

CONTENT: しまむらはちゃんと取れたの?
CONTENT_TRANSLATION_SPANISH: ¿Tú has podido cogerlo, Shimamura?
CONTENT_TRANSLATION_ENGLISH: Were you able to catch it, Shimamura?

CONTENT: まあね でも 最初にしては上手な方だと思うよ
CONTENT_TRANSLATION_SPANISH: Sí, pero no está mal para ser una principiante.
CONTENT_TRANSLATION_ENGLISH: Yeah. But that's not bad for a beginner.

CONTENT: チャイナドレスの人が投げると映画の一場面みたいで絵になるねえ
CONTENT_TRANSLATION_SPANISH: Pareces que has salido de una peli lanzando el bumerán con ese vestido. Queda muy de cine.
CONTENT_TRANSLATION_ENGLISH: But you sorta look like you're in some movie, throwing that thing in your Chinese dress. It's very cinematic.

CONTENT: いまいち?
CONTENT_TRANSLATION_SPANISH: ¿No te gusta?
CONTENT_TRANSLATION_ENGLISH: Not feeling it?

CONTENT: そっか あっ今から戻って何か別のを買おうか?
CONTENT_TRANSLATION_SPANISH: Ya veo. ¿Quieres que compre otra cosa?
CONTENT_TRANSLATION_ENGLISH: I see. Hey, should I go back and buy you something else?

CONTENT: いい いい気に入ってるし
CONTENT_TRANSLATION_SPANISH: No, no. Me gusta.
CONTENT_TRANSLATION_ENGLISH: No, no. I really like it.

CONTENT: そう でも戻ることは戻ろうか中の方があったかいし
CONTENT_TRANSLATION_SPANISH: Vale. Deberíamos volver ya. Dentro estaremos más calentitas.
CONTENT_TRANSLATION_ENGLISH: I see. But we probably should head back. It's warmer inside.

CONTENT: 今しかない と思った
CONTENT_TRANSLATION_SPANISH: Pensé que esa era mi única oportunidad.
CONTENT_TRANSLATION_ENGLISH: This was my only chance, I thought...

CONTENT: 人の目がない ここでしかしまむらに 踏み入った話はできそうにないぞと
CONTENT_TRANSLATION_SPANISH: Estábamos solas. Ese era el único sitio donde podía decírselo a Shimamura.
CONTENT_TRANSLATION_ENGLISH: Here, where no one else was around... This was the only place I'd be able to say something like this to Shimamura...

CONTENT: だから 踏み込む
CONTENT_TRANSLATION_SPANISH: Por eso, allá voy.
CONTENT_TRANSLATION_ENGLISH: So I'm going to take it.

CONTENT: 準備ができなくとも　転びそうになっても
CONTENT_TRANSLATION_SPANISH: Aunque no esté lista... Aunque me explote en la cara...
CONTENT_TRANSLATION_ENGLISH: Even if I'm not ready... Even if I fall on my face...

CONTENT: しまむら
CONTENT_TRANSLATION_SPANISH: Shimamura.
CONTENT_TRANSLATION_ENGLISH: Shimamura.

CONTENT: 安達?
CONTENT_TRANSLATION_SPANISH: ¿Adachi?
CONTENT_TRANSLATION_ENGLISH: Adachi?

CONTENT: 私は...
CONTENT_TRANSLATION_SPANISH: Me...

CONTENT: しまむらのことが好きで
CONTENT_TRANSLATION_SPANISH: Me gustas mucho, Shimamura.
CONTENT_TRANSLATION_ENGLISH: I really like you, Shimamura...

CONTENT: こう 好きで 好きで
CONTENT_TRANSLATION_SPANISH: Me gustas mucho, mucho...
CONTENT_TRANSLATION_ENGLISH: Like, really like you... love you...

CONTENT: しまむらの えっと
CONTENT_TRANSLATION_SPANISH: Shimamura, yo...
CONTENT_TRANSLATION_ENGLISH: Shimamura, I...

CONTENT: 友達に なりたくて
CONTENT_TRANSLATION_SPANISH: quiero ser tu amiga...
CONTENT_TRANSLATION_ENGLISH: ...want to be your friend...

CONTENT: もう 友達のつもりだけど?
CONTENT_TRANSLATION_SPANISH: ¿Pero no lo somos ya?
CONTENT_TRANSLATION_ENGLISH: I'm pretty sure we already are?

CONTENT: それぐらいの友達じゃなくて
CONTENT_TRANSLATION_SPANISH: No, no quiero ser solo tu amiga.
CONTENT_TRANSLATION_ENGLISH: No, not just friends...

CONTENT: 一番の友達になりたい
CONTENT_TRANSLATION_SPANISH: Quiero ser tu mejor amiga.
CONTENT_TRANSLATION_ENGLISH: But I want to be like, your best friend.

CONTENT: 一番?
CONTENT_TRANSLATION_SPANISH: ¿Mi mejor amiga?
CONTENT_TRANSLATION_ENGLISH: My best friend?

CONTENT: なりたいっていうかなる... から
CONTENT_TRANSLATION_SPANISH: Más o menos, así que...
CONTENT_TRANSLATION_ENGLISH: I sorta really want to be that, so...

CONTENT: 頑張ろうと思います
CONTENT_TRANSLATION_SPANISH: pienso esforzarme.
CONTENT_TRANSLATION_ENGLISH: I'll do my best.

CONTENT: そ... そうですか
CONTENT_TRANSLATION_SPANISH: Ya veo.
CONTENT_TRANSLATION_ENGLISH: I-I see...

CONTENT: あ... よく分からないけど
CONTENT_TRANSLATION_SPANISH: Creo que no lo entiendo,
CONTENT_TRANSLATION_ENGLISH: I don't really get it,

CONTENT: 向上心があるのはいいことだと思うよ
CONTENT_TRANSLATION_SPANISH: pero está bien que seas tan ambiciosa.
CONTENT_TRANSLATION_ENGLISH: but it's great that you're so ambitious.

CONTENT: う... うん
CONTENT_TRANSLATION_SPANISH: ¡Sí!
CONTENT_TRANSLATION_ENGLISH: Y-Yeah!

CONTENT: クリスマスだからと劇的なことは起こらない
CONTENT_TRANSLATION_SPANISH: Que sea Navidad no garantiza que vaya a ocurrir nada dramático.
CONTENT_TRANSLATION_ENGLISH: Nothing dramatic is guaranteed to happen just because it's Christmas.

CONTENT: きっと 今日という日はいい思い出にならない
CONTENT_TRANSLATION_SPANISH: El de hoy no va a ser un gran recuerdo.
CONTENT_TRANSLATION_ENGLISH: Today's not going to be a great memory or anything.

CONTENT: 何しろ頭が真っ白になってばかりで
CONTENT_TRANSLATION_SPANISH: Mi mente estuvo todo el día en blanco,
CONTENT_TRANSLATION_ENGLISH: I mean, my mind just kept going blank,

CONTENT: 記憶どころじゃなかったからだ
CONTENT_TRANSLATION_SPANISH: así que no podía recordar nada.
CONTENT_TRANSLATION_ENGLISH: so I didn't really have a chance to remember anything.

CONTENT: 景色を雪が覆い隠すように
CONTENT_TRANSLATION_SPANISH: Como si fuera un paisaje lleno de nieve...
CONTENT_TRANSLATION_ENGLISH: Just like scenery being covered in snow...

CONTENT: ホワイトアルバムがあったことだけを　鮮明に刻み込む
CONTENT_TRANSLATION_SPANISH: Grabaré el recuerdo de un álbum blanco en mi memoria. Episodio 6: Álbum blanco
CONTENT_TRANSLATION_ENGLISH: I'm just going to carve the memory of a white album into the back of my brain.
